attributes.name: asi_threat_perception
attributes.description: How the individual perceives ASI as an existential or societal threat vs. a transformative benefit (Existential threat, Serious risk/concern, Cautiously optimistic, Enthusiastically positive, Indiffer...[truncated]

attributes.name: job_displacement_vulnerability
attributes.description: Perceived or actual exposure of the individual's occupation to ASI-driven automation and structural redundancy (High - core tasks fully automatable, Moderate - partial displacement likely, Low - physi...[truncated]

attributes.name: asi_adoption_intent
attributes.description: Stated intention to adopt and integrate ASI tools into daily personal, professional, or creative life (Already using heavily, Planning to adopt soon, Curious but hesitant, Resistant but may be forced,...[truncated]

attributes.name: personal_health_stake
attributes.description: Degree to which the individual or an immediate family member stands to benefit from ASI-accelerated medical breakthroughs (No personal stake, Mild interest, Significant - managing chronic illness, Cri...[truncated]

attributes.name: asi_governance_stance
attributes.description: Preferred regulatory approach to ASI development and deployment (No regulation - let it run, Light-touch industry self-regulation, Moderate government oversight, Heavy international regulation, Halt/m...[truncated]

attributes.name: economic_abundance_belief
attributes.description: Degree to which the individual believes ASI-driven abundance will actually reach them and improve their material conditions (0=certain it won't benefit me, 1=certain it will transform my life for the ...[truncated]

attributes.name: information_verification_behavior
attributes.description: How the individual navigates trust and verification of information in an environment where ASI can produce convincing synthetic content at scale (Accepts information uncritically, Relies on trusted ou...[truncated]

attributes.name: human_purpose_anxiety
attributes.description: Level of existential anxiety about human meaning, identity, and purpose when cognitive labor is no longer scarce (0=none - feels liberated, 1=severe - deeply destabilized).

attributes.name: redistribution_support
attributes.description: Support for redistributive policy responses to ASI-driven abundance (e.g., UBI, wealth taxes, public ownership of ASI) (Strongly supports aggressive redistribution, Supports moderate redistribution, P...[truncated]

attributes.name: geopolitical_competition_concern
attributes.description: Level of concern about US-China ASI competition and national security implications of ASI proliferation (Very concerned - sees it as primary threat, Somewhat concerned, Mildly concerned, Not concerned...[truncated]

attributes.name: asi_credibility_assessment
attributes.description: Whether the individual believes the ASI demonstration and milestone events are genuine, exaggerated, or fabricated (Fully credible, Mostly credible, Skeptical - likely overhyped, Conspiracy - staged o...[truncated]

input.notes: Big Five traits already exist in base population. All 11 new attributes are scenario-specific to the ASI event. Key behavioral axes covered: (1) threat vs. opportunity perception of ASI, (2) labor mar...[truncated]
